walletModal.title: Your wallet data
walletModal.info: You just generated a pair of Secret Key and Address. In case you lost the pair â€“ your wallet and coins will be inaccessible. Please keep your pair in a safe place. To claim free test coins you have to use this generated address on the previous page. Using the Secret key you can make transactions and check current account status in Student app or in the Ariadne wallet. Paste the secret key in the wallet app, leaving the passphrase field empty.
